When a link shared with Open Link With, browsers are suggested in addition to the native apps.\n\nSelect below to modify this behavior.
Never suggest browsers. Only native apps
Include all browsers into suggested apps list
Popraw sortowanie aplikacji dajÄ…c dostÄ™p do statystyk.
If you enjoy Open Link With, would you mind taking a minute to rate it? Thanks for the support!
Would you like to give me more details?
Please find â€œRate this appâ€ section in Play Store to give a rating.\n\nThanks for the support! ğŸ‰

Use Add to Home screen to quickly access your fav links with your fav apps.

When enabled, this feature adds Add to Home screen to your system Share menu.
When selected you will have an option to add the shared link into your home screen.

When enabled, this feature adds Open With option into system level text selection pop-up.

This feature can be useful in situations where sharing link is not feasible. When link is already visible in a text field, long click to select the text with the link and click Open With.

Direct Share is an Android feature where more relevant share targets are presented separately in the share menu.

When enabled, Open Link With will be presented at top in the system share menu.
Also note that priority is set to low. If Android finds more relevant targets from other apps, Open Link With may not be offered.

Warning: Experimental feature!

Makes Android recognize Open Link With as a Browser.

When enabled, using share will not be necessary, just clicking links will trigger Open Link With and open the link in the native app. It will also un-shorten any shortened link.

Be careful! Since Chrome (or your favorite browser) will not be default anymore, you may notice some behavior changes. As a benefit, your phone will be better with opening links in native apps.

Warning: Experimental feature!

When enabled, the foreground application (you shared the link from) will not be suggested.

Example: When sharing from browser, browser will not be suggested again. If no native app is found, you will see a warning message.
If not enabled, the foreground application will be suggested even though it is already open.
In the next window, please select Open Link With, and then select Always.
